text: M. Selvaraj (51) of Pennagaram in Dharmapuri was killed in a road accident involving a car in Sulur on Sunday. The Sulur Police said that the accident took place when Selvaraj tried to cross the Trichy Road. He died on the spot. The police have registered a case against the car driver, R. Haridass on charges of rash and negligent driving.
title: Fatal knock
